name: Sim Soccer
description:
2014 Soccer Cup is about to start! Do you want the gods to predict the outcome of every game?

Which teams will qualify in the group match? How will each team do in the rematch? Who will be the “Final Four”? And ultimately, which country will take away the trophy? "Sim Soccer" will be your best helper for predicting the results of the competition.

Download "Sim Soccer" today and become a soccer expert!
Includes data of the 32 teams of this year’s soccer cup. You can choose two teams to compete in a
simulated game, and predict the outcome of various combinations of the game with the data and simulated game results! You can also repeat the simulation several times to obtain the most likely outcome.

As the start of the game gets closer and the official list of the players on each team is released, the system will automatically update team information to allow more accurate simulation results.

※ Please note: This product’s simulation results are for reference only, do not place bets according to the results.
